4.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage and has a 30% chance to reset cooldown of your "Double Shot".
4.name: Steady_Shot
4.title: Steady Shot

6.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEnchants an arrow with a tranquilizer.
Successful hits with this arrow apply !e1 stacks of the Tranquil Arrow effect that decreases movement speed by 5% per stack, thus decreasing it by the total of !e2%.
Lasts for 12 seconds.
Any damage removes one stack of Tranquil Arrow effect, but increases its duration.
You can keep up to 3 Tranquil Arrows in your quiver.
6.name: Enchant_a_Tranquil_Arrow
6.title: Enchant a Tranquil Arrow

7.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dShoots 2 arrows at once that inflict !e1 to !e2 damage each.
The target must be at least 8 yards away from you.
7.name: Double_Shot
7.title: Double Shot

8.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEnchants an arrow with fire that inflicts !e1 damage every 3 seconds for 12 seconds.
You can keep up to 3 Incendiary Arrows in your quiver.
8.name: Enchant_an_Incendiary_Arrow
8.title: Enchant an Incendiary Arrow

9.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dAllows you to jump behind the target's back and deal !e1 to !e2 damage.
9.name: Speed_of_the_Damned
9.title: Speed of the Damned

10.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dMelee attack that inflicts !e1 to !e2 damage and applies the Bleeding Wound effect that additionally inflicts !e3 damage every 2 seconds.
Duration: 10 seconds.
10.name: Crippling_Blow
10.title: Crippling Blow

11.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage and applies Under the Aim effect that increases damage of your "Rapid Fire", "Double Shot", "Intuitive Shot" and "Steady Shot" against this target by 15%.
Duration: 6.
11 seconds.
The target must be at least 8 yards away from you.
Under the Aim effect is applied even if your shot misses.
11.name: Ranging_Fire
11.title: Ranging Fire

12.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dThrows a handful of steel spikes on the ground in a !e1 yard radius that have a chance to knock down enemies in the area.
Lasts for !e2 seconds.
12.name: Caltrops
12.title: Caltrops

13.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dAllows you to move behind the target's back and deal !e1 to !e2 damage.
Applies the Knocked Down effect to your enemy for 2 seconds.
13.name: Sambo_Roll
13.title: Sambo Roll

14.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dAllows you to quickly blend into the scenery, making you invisible.
Can be used in combat.
This effect decreases your movement speed by !e1% and will be canceled if you use any ability.
Duration: !e2 second.
14.name: Hasty_Disguise
14.title: Hasty Disguise

15.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dJump back from the target for !e1 yards and knock it down for !e2 seconds.
Recoil and "Somersault" cooldown durations are equal.
15.name: Recoil
15.title: Recoil

16.body:
!lvl !cost !dAllows using a Precision Shot to the Legs ability that knocks the target down for 2 seconds and inflicts !e1!e2damage.
!e3!e4second cooldown.
16.name: Precision_Shot
16.title: Precision Shot

17.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEnchants an arrow with lightning that inflicts !e1 damage to the target and all nearby enemies within a 5 yard radius.
You can keep up to 3 Tesla Arrows in your quiver.
17.name: Enchant_a_Tesla_Arrow
17.title: Enchant a Tesla Arrow

18.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDeals 5 furious blows by melee weapon in rapid succession.
Each blow inflicts !e1 damage.
Extends the duration of any knockdown effects on the target by 2 seconds.
Using this ability will not be interrupted by damage.
Shares a cooldown with the "Rapid Fire" ability.
18.name: Rend
18.title: Rend

19.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dFires 5 arrows in rapid succession that inflict !e1 damage each.
Each arrow hit extends the duration of any knockdown effects on the target by 2 seconds.
Shares a cooldown with Flurry of Blades ability.
The target must be at least 8 yards away from you.
19.name: Rapid_Fire
19.title: Rapid Fire

20.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dRestores 12 energy and 1% mana to all party members every !e1 secondsDispels the Natural Force effectYou cannot use Intensive Training and "Aura of Ferocity" at the same time
20.name: Intensive_Training
20.title: Intensive Training

22.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage and has a 30% chance to reset cooldown of your "Double Shot".
22.name: Intuitive_Shot
22.title: Intuitive Shot

23.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dJump back from the target for !e1 yards and knock it down for !e2 seconds.
"Recoil" and Somersault cooldown durations are equal.
23.name: Somersault
23.title: Somersault

24.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dAllows you to jump behind the target's back and deal !e1 to !e2 damage.
24.name: Supernatural_Speed
24.title: Supernatural Speed

25.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dTeleports you !e1 times to a random enemy within a 15 yard radius every 0.
5 seconds and inflicts !e2 damage.
When using this ability, your are immune to negative spells and control effects.
*Consumes 4 Tears of Dragon.*
Using Tears of Dragon of a higher quality increases the damage dealt.
25.name: Blade_Storm
25.title: Blade Storm

26.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dApplies an effect that increases the movement and attack speed by 12% and decreases the cooldown and energy consumption for all offensive abilities that depend on the weapon speed.
Duration: 20 seconds.
Under this effect, all shots can be used while moving.
*Consumes 6 Tears of Dragon.*
Using Tears of Dragon of a higher quality increases the movement and attack speed.
26.name: Onslaught
26.title: Onslaught

27.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases your parry chance by !e1%.
Increases your weapon damage in melee combat by !e2%.
27.name: Fencing_Master
27.title: Fencing Master

28.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage from the Bleeding Wound effect applied by your "Crippling Blow" ability by !e1%.
28.name: Extensive_Wounds
28.title: Extensive Wounds

29.body: !lvl !cost !dIf your Flurry of Blades goes uninterrupted, the target receives additional !e1 damage.
29.name: Coup_de_Grace
29.title: Coup de Grace

31.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dMelee attack that inflicts !e1 to !e2 damage to all enemies in front of you.
31.name: Fan_of_Knives
31.title: Fan of Knives

32.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases duration of the Bleeding Wound effect applied by your "Crippling Blow" ability by !e1 seconds.
32.name: Deep_Wounds
32.title: Deep Wounds

33.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage you deal to enemies who have less than 30% health by !e1%
33.name: Art_of_Death
33.title: Art of Death

34.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dGrants the target a Fervor effect increasing its maximum health by 15% plus additional 15% for each party member in a 100 yard range.
You can grant this effect only to one character at a time.
While in a group, only one member can be under this effect at a time.
34.name: Unity
34.title: Unity

35.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your Stamina and healing received by !e1%.
35.name: Will_to_Live
35.title: Will to Live

36.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases your armor by 30%.
Your weapon attacks increase physical damage done by your party members by !e1%Cast this spell again to remove this effectYou cannot use this spell when your shield is equipped
36.name: Aura_of_Ferocity
36.title: Aura of Ferocity

37.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases cooldown time of your Deadly Speed and "Supernatural Speed" abilities by !e1%, and increases their range by !e2%.
37.name: Extra_Speed
37.title: Extra Speed

38.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Speed of the Damned" and "Supernatural Speed" abilites grant you a Sudden Strike effect and !e1 stack(s) of Suddenness effect.
Sudden Strike effect lasts 12 seconds and increases damage of your next "Vicious Blow" or "Reflex Action" by !e2 Suddenness effect decreases damage you receive by 25%.
Each time you receive damage, one stack of this effect is consumed.
38.name: Suddenness
38.title: Suddenness

40.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your "Sambo Roll", Deadly Speed and "Supernatural Speed" by !e1%.
40.name: Mean_Tricks
40.title: Mean Tricks

41.body: !lvl !cost !dYour Escape Artist ability also dispels one Poison effect and one Disease effect from you.
41.name: Set_of_Antidotes
41.title: Set of Antidotes

42.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases cooldown time of your "Hasty Disguise" ability by !e1%, decreases its movement speed penalty by !e2% and increases its duration by !e3%, but for the next !e4 seconds after its effect fades, you will be unable to use "Steady Shot", "Intuitive Shot" or "Double Shot".
42.name: Quietness
42.title: Quietness

43.body: !lvl !cost !dYour "Vicious Blow" and "Reflex Action" inflict !e1% to !e2% additional damage.
43.name: Lucky_Blade
43.title: Lucky Blade

44.body: !lvl !cost !dEach hit of Flurry of Blades inflicts damage to an additional random hostile creature within 7 yard radius from the target.
44.name: Ninjutsu
44.title: Ninjutsu

45.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases duration of Under the Aim effect applied by your "Ranging Fire" ability by !e1, and increases damage of "Ranging Fire" by !e2%.
45.name: Patience
45.title: Patience

46.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the damage dealt by "Steady Shot" and "Intuitive Shot" by !e1%.
46.name: Marksmanship
46.title: Marksmanship

49.body: !lvl !cost !dAllows you to enchant the magical arrows !e1% faster.
49.name: Swift_Fletching
49.title: Swift Fletching

50.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEnchants an arrow with poison that inflicts 10.
2 damage every 2 seconds for 8 seconds.
If the enemy is moving, duration of this effect is increased by 2 seconds.
Such increase may not occur more than 8 times in a row.
Shooting this arrow costs 20 energy and has a 60 second cooldown.
You can keep up to 3 Crippling Arrows in your quiver.
50.name: Enchant_a_Crippling_Arrow
50.title: Enchant a Crippling Arrow

52.body: !lvl !cost !dAllows you to store up to !e1 arrows of each type in your quiver.
52.name: Enlarged_Quiver
52.title: Enlarged Quiver

53.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the distance of your ranged attacks by !e1% and their damage by !e2%.
53.name: Eagle_Vision
53.title: Eagle Vision

54.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage and knocks the target down for 4 seconds.
In combat, cooldown time of Merciless Shot is increased by 100%.
54.name: Merciless_Shot
54.title: Merciless Shot

55.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases duration of your "Precision Shot" effects by !e1%.
55.name: Sharpshooter
55.title: Sharpshooter

56.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your Incendiary Arrow by !e1%, and damage of Tesla Arrow by !e2%.
56.name: Secret_Knowledge
56.title: Secret Knowledge

57.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your "Rapid Fire" ability by !e1%.
57.name: Destructive_Shots
57.title: Destructive Shots

58.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases energy cost of your "Double Shot" by !e1%.
58.name: Subtle_Fingers
58.title: Subtle Fingers

59.body: !lvl !cost !dEach time your "Steady Shot" or "Intuitive Shot" reset the cooldown of "Double Shot", you restore !e1% of their energy cost.
59.name: Physical_Reserve
59.title: Physical Reserve

60.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your chance to dodge by !e1% of your current chance to dodge, and decreases energy cost of your "Recoil", "Somersault", Deadly Speed and "Supernatural Speed" abilities by !e2%.
60.name: Quickened_Reflexes
60.title: Quickened Reflexes

62.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases critical chance of all your abilities and effects by !e1%.
62.name: Piercing_Blows
62.title: Piercing Blows

63.body:
!lvl !cost !dWhen your health drops lower than !e1%, you can use a special ability that moves you !e2 yards away in a random direction and increases your movement speed by !e3% for 6 seconds.
You have 8 seconds to use this ability.
!e4 second cooldown.
This ability can only be used while you are under offensive control effect.
63.name: Frightful_Presence
63.title: Frightful Presence

64.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your elemental, nature and divine resistances by !e1%.
64.name: Master_of_Survival
64.title: Master of Survival

65.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dRemoves invisibility effects from all enemies in the area for 15 seconds.
65.name: Blinding_Flash
65.title: Blinding Flash

66.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases duration of stuns, knockdowns and movement impairing effects by !e1%.
66.name: Cat's_Swiftness
66.title: Cat's Swiftness

68.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCasts a Smoke Cloud over the selected area for 10 seconds.
Those who stand in the cloud are hidden from everyone on the outside.
68.name: Smoke_Cloud
68.title: Smoke Cloud

69.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Vicious Blow" and "Reflex Action" have a 13.
8% chance to apply an Intense Pain effect that inflicts !e1 damage every second for 5 seconds.
Your "Steady Shot" and "Intuitive Shot" have a 12.
2% chance to apply an Intense Pain effect that inflicts !e2 damage every second for 5 seconds.
69.name: Accumulated_Heat
69.title: Accumulated Heat

70.body: !lvl !cost !dUsing the Escape Artist ability increases your movement speed by 80% for 5 seconds.
70.name: Quick_March
70.title: Quick March

71.body:
!lvl !cost !dWhen you receive a deadly blow, you have 6 seconds to avenge your death: your movement speed is increased by 40%, energy cost of your abilities is decreased by 100%, and you are immune to all damage or harmful effects.
As these 6 seconds pass, you die.
71.name: Last_Laugh
71.title: Last Laugh

72.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your Endurance by !e1% and your Finesse by !e2%.
72.name: Killer_Instinct
72.title: Killer Instinct

73.body:
!lvl !cost !dYou hide behind the backs of your allies, receiving !e1% less damage from area-of-effect attacks for each ally within 10 yard radius.
This damage reduction may not exceed !e2%.
73.name: Lightning_Reflexes
73.title: Lightning Reflexes

74.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your Willpower by !e1% and decreases duration of blinding, fear and panic effects by !e2%.
74.name: Mental_Resistance
74.title: Mental Resistance
